Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; glaze fired orange-brown; white slip; interior glazed; trace of lotus flower in added white outline; exterior: single line above painted decoration consisting of curving tail of sphinx; incised inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 290, no. 884)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.1.44)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1127) (phase 2)
